ServerMain - Class in moodish.server
The server that: keep track of who follows who and forward Mood messages accordingly; keep clients informed about who friends and unfriends them; when a new client connects, the server send the list of currently connected user to that client so that the client will have an updated list of all currently connected users; when a client connects or disconnects, the server sends a message with the appropriate information to all connected clients
